name: Gus Grissom
title: Astronaut, NASA
brief_description: Lieutenant Colonel Virgil Ivan (Gus) Grissom (April 3, 1926 â€“ January 27, 1967) was one of the original NASA Project Mercury astronauts, a United States Air Force test pilot, and a mechanical engineer. He was the second American to fly in space, and the first member of the NASA Astronaut Corps to fly in space twice.
